```go
This file
contains word1 and
also word2
```

```go
some_user@macOS grep 'word1\|word2' ./sample.txt
contains word1 and
also word2
```

```go
some_user@macOS grep -e word1 -e word2 ./sample.txt
contains word1 and
also word2
```

```go
some_user@macOS grep -E 'word1|word2' ./sample.txt
contains word1 and
also word2
```
